Package index

All functions

SARP()
Create a species-area relationship plot (SARP)
SpeARP()
Create a speciation-area relationship plot
findAreas()
Find areas of land masses.
findLand()
Find the name of the land on which the occurrence points were found
getData()
Get occurrence data from GBIF
getKey()
Retrieve taxon key from GBIF
getSources()
Gather sources from GBIF data for citation
get_island_areas()
Access properly encoded island_area object
island_areas
Island name data
plot(<SAR>)
Plot a species-area relationship
print(<SAR>)
Print species-area relationship summary
quickSARP()
Quickly create a species-area relationship
removeContinents()
Remove continents from area dataframe.
speciationBAMM()
Get tip speciation rates from BAMM (Rabosky 2014) analysis
speciationDR()
Get speciation rates using the DR statistic (Jetz et al. 2012)
speciationMS()
Get speciation rates following equation 4 in Magallon and Sanderson (2001)
